thread.title: Rod Stewart extends Las Vegas residency into fifth year
thread.title_full: Rod Stewart extends Las Vegas residency into fifth year

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Rod Stewart extends Las Vegas residency into fifth year
text:
Rod Stewart extends Las Vegas residency into fifth year   
Aug 10, 2015   
LAS VEGAS, NV - As two-time Rock & Roll Hall of Fame musician Rod Stewart wraps the fourth year of his hit Las Vegas residency this August and readies the release of his highly-anticipated 30th solo studio album, "Another Country" this fall, AEG Live and Caesars Entertainment today announced a new Spring 2016 run of "Rod Stewart: The Hits." at The Colosseum at Caesars Palace. 
Tickets for the first nine concerts of Stewart's residency in 2016 will go on-sale Friday, Aug. 14 at 10 a.m. 
Since its debut in 2011, "Rod Stewart: The Hits." has been seen by almost 400,000 fans and has remained one of the best reviewed shows on the Vegas Strip, drawing worldwide praise from fans and critics alike. Stewart personally creates his ever-evolving set-list that's always heavy on his most iconic hits including "Maggie May," "You Wear it Well," "Hot Legs," "You're in My Heart," "Do You Think I'm Sexy," "Some Guys Have All the Luck," "Young Turks," and "Forever Young," and sprinkled with a few R&B hits and new tracks. 
Tickets for the following spring 2016 shows go on-sale Friday, Aug. 14 at 10 a.m.: 
March: 19, 20, 23, 25, 26, 29 
April: 1, 2, 5 
Fans can also catch the final 2015 performances of "Rod Stewart: The Hits." playing the below dates now at The Colosseum: 
Aug.: 12, 15, 16
